query:
DELETE FROM publications WHERE id > 1;

INSERT INTO publications (title, journal, year, month, type, authors, abstract, keywords, labMembers, journalTier, featured) VALUES 
('Ultra-broadband near- to mid-infrared electro-optic modulator on thin-film lithium niobate', 'Nature Communications', 2026, 1, 'journal', 'Li Qiyuan, Sun Aolong, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'A broadband thin-film lithium niobate (TFLN) electro-optic modulator covering O-U telecom band and extending to 2 μm band with over 67 GHz bandwidth and 240+ Gbps PAM-4 transmission.', '["光电调制器", "薄膜铌酸锂", "宽带", "光通信"]', '["孙奥龙"]', 'top', 1),
('High-speed optical communication based on advanced modulation formats', 'Nature Communications', 2025, 6, 'journal', 'Xing Sizhe, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Advanced modulation formats and signal processing techniques for high-speed optical communication systems.', '["高速光通信", "调制格式", "信号处理"]', '["邢思哲"]', 'top', 1),
('Novel approach to optical interconnects for data centers', 'Nature Communications', 2024, 9, 'journal', 'Xing Sizhe, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Innovative optical interconnect solutions for next-generation data center networks.', '["光互连", "数据中心", "光子集成"]', '["邢思哲"]', 'top', 1),
('Photonics Research in Advanced Optical Systems', 'Photonics Research', 2025, 4, 'journal', 'Sun Aolong, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Advanced optical systems and photonic integration technologies.', '["光子学", "光子集成", "光学系统"]', '["孙奥龙"]', 'high', 1),
('Innovative Optical Modulation Techniques', 'Chinese Optics Letters', 2025, 3, 'journal', 'Xing Sizhe, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Novel optical modulation techniques for next-generation communication systems.', '["光调制", "通信系统", "创新技术"]', '["邢思哲"]', 'high', 1),
('Coherent passive optical networks for 100G/λ-and-beyond fiber access', 'IEEE Network', 2022, 5, 'journal', 'Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Recent progress and outlook on coherent passive optical networks for high-speed fiber access.', '["相干光通信", "无源光网络", "光纤接入"]', '[]', 'high', 1),
('Ultra-compact and Low-loss Pixelated Mode (De)-Multiplexer for Mode-division Multiplexed Coherent-lite Optical Interconnects', 'OFC 2025', 2025, 3, 'conference', 'Dong Boyu, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Ultra-compact mode (de)multiplexer for mode-division multiplexed optical interconnects.', '["模式复用", "光互连", "集成光子"]', '["董博宇"]', 'medium', 1),
('High-speed optical transmission techniques for data center applications', 'OFC 2025', 2025, 3, 'conference', 'Sun Aolong, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Advanced transmission techniques for high-speed data center optical networks.', '["数据中心", "高速传输", "光通信"]', '["孙奥龙"]', 'medium', 1),
('Intelligent signal processing for coherent optical systems', 'OFC 2025', 2025, 3, 'conference', 'Yan An, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'AI-based signal processing techniques for coherent optical communication systems.', '["信号处理", "人工智能", "相干光通信"]', '["颜安"]', 'medium', 1),
('400G Coherent Digital Subcarrier Multiplexing for the All-Optical Metro-Access-Mobile Integrated Network', 'OECC 2025', 2025, 6, 'conference', 'Li Yaxuan, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Coherent digital subcarrier multiplexing for integrated metro-access-mobile networks.', '["相干光通信", "光网络", "数字调制"]', '["李雅萱"]', 'medium', 1),
('Low-Complexity and Rapid-Adaptive Neural Network Equalizer based on SkipNet for High-Speed Optical IM/DD Communication System', 'OECC 2025', 2025, 6, 'conference', 'Hu Yongzhu, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Neural network-based equalizer for high-speed optical communication systems.', '["神经网络", "均衡器", "光通信"]', '["胡雍竹"]', 'medium', 1),
('Challenges and Solutions to 200G-PON in Optical Access', 'OECC 2025', 2025, 6, 'conference', 'Wang Chengxi, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Technical challenges and solutions for 200G passive optical networks.', '["无源光网络", "光接入", "高速传输"]', '["王成熙"]', 'medium', 1),
('Cost-effective and Flexible Coherent Optics for Next-Generation Optical Access Networks', 'ECOC 2025', 2025, 9, 'conference', 'Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Cost-effective coherent optical solutions for next-generation access networks.', '["相干光学", "光接入网络", "成本优化"]', '[]', 'medium', 1),
('Field Demonstration of Full-Photonic Assisted Ultra-Reliable Hybrid FSO/MMW Transmission over 4.3 km based on Single Optical Coherent Receiver', 'ECOC 2025', 2025, 9, 'conference', 'Liu Yinjun, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Field demonstration of hybrid free-space optical and millimeter-wave transmission.', '["自由空间光通信", "毫米波", "混合传输"]', '["刘胤君"]', 'medium', 1),
('400G Coherent Digital Subcarrier Multiplexing for the All-Optical Metro-Access-Mobile Integrated Network', 'ECOC 2025', 2025, 9, 'conference', 'Yuan Yuqin, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Coherent digital subcarrier multiplexing for integrated optical networks.', '["相干光通信", "光网络", "数字调制"]', '["袁玉琴"]', 'medium', 1),
('Intelligent and Flexible Coherent Optics for Next-Generation Optical Access Network', 'ACP 2025', 2025, 11, 'conference', 'Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Intelligent and flexible coherent optical solutions for next-generation access networks.', '["相干光学", "光接入", "人工智能"]', '[]', 'medium', 1),
('FPGA-based Real-Time Synchronization with Robustness and Low Complexity for Burst-Mode 100G Coherent Passive Optical Networks', 'ACP 2025', 2025, 11, 'conference', 'Zheng Renle, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'FPGA-based synchronization techniques for burst-mode coherent PON systems.', '["FPGA", "同步", "无源光网络"]', '["郑仁乐"]', 'medium', 1),
('Scintillation-Resistant Coherent Free-Space Optical Communication Based on Local-Oscillator Power Controlling', 'ACP 2025', 2025, 11, 'conference', 'Deng Xuyu, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'Scintillation-resistant techniques for coherent free-space optical communication.', '["自由空间光通信", "闪烁抑制", "相干检测"]', '["邓旭宇"]', 'medium', 1),
('High-speed Optical Transmissions for Data Center and Intelligent Computing Center Interconnects', 'ACP 2025', 2025, 11, 'conference', 'Luo Penghao, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'High-speed optical transmission technologies for data center and AI computing interconnects.', '["数据中心", "光互连", "高速传输"]', '["骆鹏豪"]', 'medium', 1),
('Opportunities and Challenges for Next Generation AI-native Fixed Access Network', 'ACP 2025', 2025, 11, 'conference', 'Chen Liangtao, Zhang Junwen et al.', 'AI-native optical access networks for next-generation broadband services.', '["人工智能", "光接入网络", "固定宽带"]', '["陈亮涛"]', 'medium', 1);
